Uses of Class
com.jme3.texture.image.ImageRaster

  • Packages that use ImageRaster 
    Package Description
    com.jme3.asset
    com.jme3.asset contains the AssetManager, a utility class that is used to load assets such as textures, models, and sound effects in a jME3 application.
    com.jme3.system  
    com.jme3.system.android  
    com.jme3.terrain.heightmap

    • Uses of ImageRaster in com.jme3.asset

      Subclasses of ImageRaster in com.jme3.asset 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AndroidImageInfo
      AndroidImageInfo is set in a jME3 image via the Image.setEfficentData(java.lang.Object) method to retrieve a Bitmap when it is needed by the renderer.
